title: New: Brandyn Burnette – State I’m In EP
content:
The transition of LA’s Brandyn Burnette to blog-pop sensation has been seemingly overnight, and fascinating to witness.

Listings the likes of John Mayer and Coldplay amongst his inspirations and having a crystal clear visual theme running through his releases, it’s clear that his ambitions are not to be downplayed. His recently released EP, State I’m In, is his most varied and appealing release to date – merging emotional ballads like Underneath with almost Timberlake-esque pop tracks like Set In Stone and State I’m In. Check out the full EP below, alongside a video for previous EP track, Lost.

Like this? Follow our On Repeat Playlist for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
